text:
Valeriu Ștefan Zgonea (b. 3 September 1967, Craiova) is a Romanian politician. He was the President of the Chamber of Deputies of Romania from 2012 through 2016.
Politics.
He is member of PDSR in 30 April 1996.
From 2001 he is vice prime minister of P.S.D..

annotations.surface_form: President of the Chamber of Deputies of Romania
